channel.title: Max Inventory Space
channel.description: In devolution there is a little glitch where if you have a full inventory in pk, you dont lose your items when you die. Is there a way to make the max inventory space 27 instead of 28?

item.title: Max Inventory Space
item.dc:creator: @sexytimee sexytimee
item.description:
@sexytimee wrote:

So I need to make it so it empties your inventory first?
I just don’t know how :? And if you’d like you could give me one more hint. Is there already a clearinventory boolean in there?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 16, 2008, 09:50:39 PM[/size][hr]I think i got it… Could i use removeAllItems();?
that’s the empty code.

Read full topic

item.title: Max Inventory Space
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

I’ll give you a hint
The youdied method removes your equipment first
That is all

Read full topic
